mapper.select: select i.itemid as "item.itemid", i.productId as "item.productid", i.image as "item.image", i.description as "item.description", i.title as "item.title", i.price as "item.price", i.isSoldout as "item.issoldout", i.likecnt as "item.likecnt", i.quantity as "item.quantity", g.regidate, g.paymentdate, g.nowbalance, g.targetbalance, g.status from item i inner join groupitem g on i.itemid = g.itemid where i.itemid = #{itemid}
